thing-type.label: RF9536-N 1000W Dimmer Light Switch
thing-type.description: 1000W Dimmer Light Switch<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<ul&gt<li&gtASPIRE RF Dimmers replace regular switches to provide local and remote ON/OFF/DIM/BRIGHT control and are compatible with Incandescent, Magnetic Low-Voltage lighting loads.</li&gt <li&gtASPIRE RF Dimmers provide other programmable functions (scenes, events, association, child lockout, etc.) when used with ASPIRE RF or other Z-Wave compliant controllers*. Each dimmer can be manually and remotely controlled by commands sent from an ASPIRE RF controller (RFTDCSG, RFHDCSG, RFBER) or other Z-Wave compatible controllers or programs.</li&gt <li&gtASPIRE RF Dimmers utilize existing 120V/AC, 60Hz standard house wiring and fit into standard wallboxes. No new wiring needed.</li&gt </ul&gt<p&gt(*Note: some specific ASPIRE RF features may not be programmable)</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPress the device switch one time to include it in the network. The LED will stop blinking.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPress the device switch one time to exclude it in the network. The LED will start blinking.</p&gt

A setting other than 0 will likely result in undesired operation</p&gt</p&gt
